title: Mod无法导入前置mod
author: TONY_All
txt_content:
我在Forge的build.gradle里添加了 
    deobfCompile "mcp.mobius.waila:Hwyla:1.8.26-B41_1.12.2"复制代码但是不能正常导入,报错如下Could not find deobf.mcp.mobius.waila:Hwyla:1.8.26-B41_1.12.2.  Searched in the following locations:    - https://files.minecraftforge.net ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.pom    - https://files.minecraftforge.net ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.jar    - https://repo.maven.apache.org/ma ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.pom    - https://repo.maven.apache.org/ma ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.jar    - https://libraries.minecraft.net/ ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.pom    - https://libraries.minecraft.net/ ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.jar    - http://tehnut.info/maven/deobf/m ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.pom    - http://tehnut.info/maven/deobf/m ... 8.26-B41_1.12.2.jar    - file:/Users/tony_all/.gradle/caches/minecraft/deobfedDeps/deobf/mcp/mobius/waila/Hwyla/1.8.26-B41_1.12.2/Hwyla-1.8.26-B41_1.12.2.pom    - file:/Users/tony_all/.gradle/caches/minecraft/deobfedDeps/deobf/mcp/mobius/waila/Hwyla/1.8.26-B41_1.12.2/Hwyla-1.8.26-B41_1.12.2.jar    - file:/Users/tony_all/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.12.2-14.23.5.2847/snapshot/20171003/Hwyla-1.8.26-B41_1.12.2.jar    - file:/Users/tony_all/.gradle/caches/minecraft/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.12.2-14.23.5.2847/snapshot/20171003/Hwyla.jar  Required by:      project :    Possible solution:   - Declare repository providing the artifact, see the documentation at https://docs.gradle.org/current/ ... g_repositories.html

replies.author: 赤刃泉润CQR
replies.txt_content: 你还要新建一个文件夹在MDK下，将这个文件夹命名为“libs”，然后将前置mod放在这个文件夹里就行了。

replies.author: MaxSeth
replies.txt_content: emm 你在maven那里加了额外的maven仓库了吗

replies.author: TONY_All
replies.txt_content:
12356789onetwo 发表于 2020-6-11 13:16
emm 你在maven那里加了额外的maven仓库了吗
? ? ?我是开发mod...不是插件啊...用的ForgeGradle....如果你说仓库的话..我加了

replies.txt_content: MKD在哪，找不到怎么办，自己创建一个吗，在哪创建？
